triples.name: Unmanned aerial vehicle
triples.relevance: The paper focuses on unmanned aircraft systems (drones) as the primary technology for urban and operational applications.

triples.name: Urban air mobility
triples.relevance: UAM is the central paradigm discussed, representing the innovative air transportation system for passengers and cargo in urban settings.

triples.name: Airspace
triples.relevance: Airspace classifications are a key topic, essential for understanding regulatory frameworks for UAS operations.

triples.name: Aviation regulations
triples.relevance: The paper addresses updated regulations and guidelines necessary for safe integration of UAS into urban environments.

triples.name: Air travel
triples.relevance: Air transportation is the fundamental task being addressed through the integration of unmanned systems into urban mobility.
